column1: To investigate the effects of a deficiency of Abcg8 / sterolin - 2 on the genes that regulate sterol metabolism, quantitative RT - PCR was performed looking at the expression levels of Abcg5, Abcg8, Hmgr, Cyp7a1, Abca1, Mdr2, Lxr, Srebp - 1c, and Srebp - 2 mRNA in the livers of mice fed a regular chow diet ( Figure 4a).

Antibodies used are against AJ proteins and include E - cadherin ( E - cad), the transmembrane core protein; beta - catenin ( beta - cat), which binds E - cadherin at AJs and which can also participate as a transcription cofactor when associated with LEF - 1 / TCF proteins in the nucleus; alpha - catenin ( alpha - cat) which binds to both beta - catenin and Ajuba, a close relative of zyxin; and Ajuba, which can associate with proteins that bind to the actin cytoskeleton, as well as with Grb - 2, a mediator of the GTP nucleotide - exchange protein Sos, involved in activation of the Ras - MAPK signaling cascade.

Tanaka and Y. Nishimune), rat anti - BC7 ( 1: 50, gift of H. Tanaka and Y. Nishimune), rat anti - TRA369 ( 1: 200, gift of H. Tanaka and Y. Nishimune), rabbit anti - RAD51 ( 1: 600 Calbiochem, http: / / www. calbiochem. com, PC130), mouse anti - GMP - 1 / SUMO - 1 ( 1: 200, Zymed, http: / / invitrogen. com, 33 - 2400), rabbit anti - phospho - H2AX ( Ser139) ( 1: 200, Upstate, http: / / www. millipore. com, 01 - 164), mouse anti - phospho - H2AX ( 1: 200, Upstate, 05 - 636), mouse anti - SYCP3 ( 1: 200, Abcam, http: / / www. abcam. com, ab12452), rabbit anti - HP1 beta ( 1: 100, Abcam, ab10478), rabbit anti - H3 - 2meK9 ( 1: 100, Upstate, 07 - 441), rabbit anti - H3 - 3meK9 ( 1: 200, Upstate, 07 - 442), rabbit anti - AR ( N - 20) ( 1: 200, Santa Cruz Biotechnology, sc - 816), and mouse anti - alpha SMA clone 1A4 ( 1: 800, Sigma, http: / / www. sigmaaldrich. com, A2547).
